docs.title: Welcome to the 1KZ-TE Technical Manual
docs.text:
This site is a structured, web-friendly adaptation of Toyota service documentation for the 1KZ-TE diesel engine—organized for fast navigation, clear workflows, and practical use in the garage.

It’s built for owners, techs, and engineers who want factory-level procedures without fighting a PDF.

docs.title: What you’ll find here
docs.text:
• Quick Reference: fluids, common torques, repeatable procedures
  • Common Jobs: timing belt, head gasket workflows, pump/turbo R&R notes
  • Diagnostics: symptom-driven troubleshooting and DTC workflows
  • Procedures by System: engine mechanical, fuel, ECD, turbo, cooling, lubrication, starting
  • Specs & Tools: service limits, measurement guidance, and SST notes

If you’re new, start with the pages below.

docs.title: Start here
docs.text:
• Scope & Models — What this manual covers (and what it doesn’t)
  • Safety & Conventions — How procedures, specs, and notation are presented
  • Quick Reference — The stuff you’ll look up constantly

docs.title: Recommended paths (depending on what you’re doing)
If the engine won’t start / runs poorly
docs.text: Go to Diagnostics → Troubleshooting Workflow, then: - Symptom tables - DTC index - Connector and harness testing

docs.title: If you’re doing a big job (timing belt, head, pump, turbo)
docs.text: Go to Common Jobs first. These pages are task-based and link out to the deeper procedures.

docs.title: If you’re verifying wear or building a plan
docs.text: Go to Specs & Tools and Service Specifications. That’s the “truth table” for measurements and limits.

docs.title: How this site is built
docs.text:
This project is derived from Toyota service literature (including RM790E and related supplements). Content is reorganized for clarity and navigation while keeping factory terminology and specifications where applicable.

Any added interpretation, shortcuts, or field notes are labeled as commentary.

docs.title: Contribute / improve
docs.text:
If you find: - missing pages - unclear steps - broken links - better diagrams

…log it as an issue or submit a pull request.

This is meant to become the cleanest, most usable 1KZ-TE reference on the internet.

docs.title: Scope & Models
docs.text:
This documentation is a structured, web-based adaptation of Toyota Service Repair Manual RM790E and related supplements for the 1KZ-TE diesel engine.

It is intended as a technical reference for inspection, diagnosis, service, and repair of the 1KZ-TE engine and its supporting systems.

docs.title: Covered Engine
docs.text: 1KZ-TE - Configuration: Inline 4-cylinder - Displacement: 2982 cc - Induction: Turbocharged - Injection: Indirect injection (prechamber) - Fuel system: Electronically controlled Denso VE rotary pump - Timing drive: Timing belt

docs.title: What This Manual Covers
docs.text:
• Engine mechanical systems
  • Fuel injection and electronic diesel control (ECD)
  • Turbocharging and emissions systems
  • Cooling, lubrication, and starting systems
  • Factory diagnostic and test procedures

docs.title: What This Manual Does Not Cover
docs.text:
• Vehicle chassis, suspension, or body systems
  • Automatic transmission internals
  • Market-specific wiring outside engine-related circuits
  • Non-factory performance modifications
